content.antiphon: Maranatha! Come, O Christ the Lord!
verses:
I am the Root of Jesse and David's Son,
The radiant Star of morning and God's
Own light. (Antiphon)

The Spirit and the Bride say: "Come!"
Let him who hears their voices say:
"Come!". (Antiphon)

He who has thirst, let him come,
and he who has desire, let him drink
the waters of everlasting life.

Yes, I come very soon!
Amen!
Come, 0 Lord Jesus!
(Antiphon)
